title: In the case of plots which are sub-divided in built-up areas, in addition to the above, the means of access to the sub- division from existing streets and in addition, in the case of plots which are sub-divided in built up area, the means of access to each sub-plot from existing streets

section: Contour plan of site, wherever necessary .
